sense.def:
To be undetected
pomeni, da nas ljudje ne opazijo ali prepoznajo.

seg.quote: It was important to my safety that I should remain undetected.

sense.def:
To do something undetected
pomeni, da nekaj naredimo tako, da nas pri tem nihče ne opazi.

seg.quote: I don't see any way I could get her out undetected.
